work_experience.position: Software Product Business Architecture Associate Manager - DevOps Lead
duties: Work in small team (from previous job) to build a cloud application for data scientists to use as their development platform
Create and manage Helm charts for our data platform, along with charts for 3rd party integrations with tools such as PostgreSQL or SAS
Deploy and maintain Kubernetes clusters in AWS, Azure, and Google environments, for both QA and production uses
Keep up to date installation instructions, and help internal networking teams deploy and maintain the platform
Develop integration with SAML SSO environments, using Shibboleth Service Provider
Manage Git and Jenkins CI/CD for development of the platform, including automated container builds, tests, and CVE scans
Manage release cycle of platform, making sure all blockers get resolved before releasing new version, and working to get the upgrade rolled out in production environments
Help with fixes and improvements to the REST Python backend when available, mostly around the features related to automated Helm installations of different tools
Develop new features and make general improvements to the application's Angular JS based UI
Responsible for deploying new builds of the application to public servers
Create and manage configuration of private site portals for individual clients
Work with the lead sysadmin to fix the internal/public sites when problems come up
Maintain the PyPI release of the company's data library Ticdat
Develop helper functions to integrate Ticdat with the OPL and Lingo modeling languages
Help out in other areas of the code base as needed
Create and maintain testing suites for the UI's AngularJS based frontend
Work with the lead UI dev to prototype and debug the UI during Agile development
Manage and close the library at night when full time staff are not working
Assist library patrons with checking materials in and out of the library
Lead other students in shelving and maintaining the library's bookshelves
